wikipedia_page.main: William Gibson (17 September 1926 – 21 January 1995) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a right back in the Football League for Arsenal, Brentford and Tranmere Rovers.

response: William Gibson (born 1948) is an American-Canadian science fiction author.
